rows.label: tev072401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kan'tonam how he feels about humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Kan'tonam about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0001
rows.name:
You crushed Goetia and fought off countless numbers
of Ganglion soldiers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0002
rows.name:
To us Orphe, you humans are both a reliable friend
and an object of fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0003
rows.name:
We're grateful for your strength when you protect us,
but what if you turn that strength against us when
we're no longer needed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0004
rows.name:
We would have no power to defend ourselves.
You could eradicate our species in an eyeblink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0005
rows.name:
That is why Yin'tonam and myself are constantly
striving to understand what motivates humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I find something compelling about the mission of
the Reclaimers. To think they spend all their days
gathering the remains of your White Whale...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0009
rows.name:
This is why I have decided to join BLADE myself.
I look forward to working with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0010
rows.name:
I have no aptitude for combat, of course,
but my ability to sense danger is quite keen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0011
rows.name: That proved sufficient to get me past the aptitude tests.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Kan'tonam about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0021
rows.name:
I have never fully trusted humanity. I've always been
waiting for the other shoe to drop, as I think you say.
But I now feel that I have misjudged you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0022
rows.name:
You treat entirely different species—like we Orphe
and the Ma-non—just as you do your own kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0023
rows.name:
My Ovah has no memory of the Orphe ever being
shown such kindness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0024
rows.name:
The idea of helping others even when you yourself are
in peril would never occur to the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0013
rows.name: Thanks to you, I managed to return here safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0014
rows.name:
The experience had left me interested in attempting
a bath, as per Anna's impassioned recommendation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0015
rows.name:
But as soon as I entered the hot water,
my skin began to swell up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0016
rows.name:
If you humans bathe in order to disinfect yourselves,
wouldn't bathing IN disinfectant be a more efficient way
of reaching your goal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Nevertheless, I may suggest a bath to Yin'tonam.
His skin is especially hard, so it might be ideal for him.[ST:wait ]
